segments.text: I see the girl reaching up toward the boy, waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so excited, like she doesn’t even notice the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s ever seen the boy fall before.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is so unstable, and he’s just standing there like it’s nothing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe the woman hasn’t turned off the water yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting more and more slippery by the second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy is going to fall any moment now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, completely unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone stops them before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just chaotic and messy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman even knows the kids are taking cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR
